Literature.Title: Lipid clustering by three homologous arginine-rich antimicrobial peptides is insensitive to amino acid arrangement and induced secondary structure.
Literature.Author: Epand RM, Epand RF, Arnusch CJ, Papahadjopoulos-Sternberg B, Wang G, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=80µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>80µM),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 49141(MIC=>80µM),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 35029(MIC=>80µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=80µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 19433(MIC=80µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=1.25µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 49399(MIC=10µM)
